content: Completed Nova Dashboard core build. All 7 tabs implemented: Dashboard, Goals, Tasks, Projects, Workflows, Habits, and Memory. Ready for testing and deployment.
Decided to store Nova Dashboard data in JSON files locally rather than database for easier GitHub sync and Axiom access. Trade-off: no concurrent editing but simpler architecture.
Francis emphasized that Q1 goal is to have 50 paying customers by end of March. Need to prioritize sales workflows and lead generation systems.
Hung will help set up BlindMatrix API integration. He needs API credentials from Chad at Forma Living. Follow up next week.
Key differentiator for Studio Shade: direct manufacturer relationship through Francis. Competitors don't have this - we can undercut by 20-30% on price.
